mapper.sql: p.id, p.name as name, p.language as language, p.parent_name as parent, p.version as version, p.used_profile as used
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rules_profiles (name, language, parent_name, version, used_profile) VALUES (#{name}, #{language}, #{parent}, #{version}, #{used})
mapper.update: UPDATE rules_profiles SET name=#{name}, language=#{language}, parent_name=#{parent}, version=#{version}, used_profile=#{used} WHERE id=#{id}
